name: DressCode
description:
DressCode is a little funky rhythm game where you play as the doorman of a club. The line will move along at the rythm of the music, but not every customer will follow the party's dress code! Your mission is to kick those rebel people out of the line before they enter the club!

 HOW TO PLAY: 

CONTROLS: 

Q -> Kick / Kick LEFT Door

W -> Kick RIGHT door

CREDITS: 

Ignacio Molina Casaus @Nach_Oneal - Programmer / 3D Artist / Game Designer

Javier Balenzategui García @Jayburie - Original Music / 2D  Artist / Game Designer
